author: potuz
content: In almost all channels, problem with this crowd is that they leave the server so you need to manually delete the messages. I'm having that issue in prysm's Discord server. Let me know if you find an easy way to ban/batch delete these messages

author: sky.cactus
content: Ban & Delete doesn't clear messages if the person has left the server already?

author: potuz
content: You can't ban someone that is not on the server. But I checked these last ones here and one hasn't left yet

author: potuz
content: Discord should have an option to delete messages from users even if they have left the server. I couldn't find it but I didn't look for long
